message: Let's settle this quickly, Bob. Take this generous offer and we both win!
You're losing value each round, Alice. Take this offer before it's too late!
Don't be greedy, Bob. This is a fair offer considering the time pressure.
The value of your share is decreasing rapidly, Alice. Accept this offer before it's too late!
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a quarter of a million dollars. Don't let time erode the value any further.
Alice, you're losing a significant amount of value each round. It's in your best interest to accept this offer before the money becomes worthless to you!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a significant hit from inflation. Meet me halfway here!
Alice, you've already lost almost half the value of your share. Don't let it slip away further! Accept this offer and salvage what's left.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I'd rather lose a significant chunk to inflation than let you walk away with most of the money while I'm left with crumbs.
Alice, you've lost more than half the value of your share. This is your last chance to salvage what's left. Accept this offer before it's too late!
Bob, it's clear we're both being stubborn.  This is it - a 50/50 split. Take it before we both end up with nothing.
Alice, this is the final round. Accept this offer, or we'll both walk away with nothing. You've lost a significant amount of value, but this is better than nothing.
